001package com.github.sormuras.bach.project;
002
003import java.nio.file.Path;
004
005/**
006 * Targets a folder to a Java feature version, with {@code 0} indicating no target version.
007 *
008 * @param directory the directory
009 * @param version the Java feature release version to target
010 * @param types the set of types associated with the directory
011 */
012public record TargetedFolder(Path directory, int version, FolderTypes types)
013    implements Comparable<TargetedFolder> {
014
015  public TargetedFolder with(Object component) {
016    return new TargetedFolder(
017        component instanceof Path directory ? directory : directory,
018        component instanceof Integer version ? version : version,
019        component instanceof FolderTypes types ? types : types);
020  }
021
022  @Override
023  public int compareTo(TargetedFolder other) {
024    return version - other.version;
025  }
026}
